divs: Sighting Detailsnoticed stationary light changing colors. looked thru binoculars and telescope. saw a diamond shape. it remained for over an hour then was gone.I was watching the baseball game and felt like I neede to get up and look out the window and there it was. I thought at first it was a plane but it didnt move. I observed several planes pass by during the time the object was in sight.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dorr
This sighting has never been favorited.
